metadata.TITLE: Armlight | Official Website – Innovation in Lighting
metadata.DESCRIPTION: Join Armlight – your trusted partner for modern lighting solutions.
metadata.KEYWORDS: Armlight, lighting, LED lights, energy saving, lighting systems
metadata.OG_DESCRIPTION: We provide high-quality and innovative lighting solutions that combine energy efficiency and durability.
metadata.TWITTER_DESCRIPTION: Armlight – your trusted partner for modern lighting solutions.

CHILDREN.TITLE: Energy-Saving Solutions
CHILDREN.TEXT: We offer modern lighting systems that combine efficiency, durability, and energy saving.

CHILDREN.TITLE: High Quality and Reliability
CHILDREN.TEXT: All Armlight products undergo strict quality control to ensure long-lasting and reliable performance.

CHILDREN.TITLE: Support and Service
CHILDREN.TEXT: We provide professional consulting and technical support to ensure the success of your project.

QA.TITLE: Frequently Asked Questions
QA.TEXT: If you can’t find the answer to your question — contact us and we’ll be happy to help.

CHILDREN.TITLE: What are your main products?
CHILDREN.TEXT: We offer LED lights, lighting systems, and energy-saving solutions for both homes and businesses.

CHILDREN.TITLE: Do you provide installation services?
CHILDREN.TEXT: Yes, our specialists can help with installation and setup of lighting systems.

CHILDREN.TITLE: What is the warranty period for your products?
CHILDREN.TEXT: All Armlight products come with an official warranty of at least 2 years.

CHILDREN.TITLE: Do you have wholesale offers?
CHILDREN.TEXT: Yes, we provide wholesale cooperation with special terms and discounts.

CHILDREN.TITLE: Where is your company located?
CHILDREN.TEXT: Our head office is located in Yerevan, and deliveries are made throughout Armenia.
